commit.message:
prefix.c (concat, lookup_key): Use xmalloc and xrealloc consistently.

        * prefix.c (concat, lookup_key): Use xmalloc and xrealloc
        consistently.

From-SVN: r31958

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* prefix.c (concat, lookup_key): Use xmalloc and xrealloc
+	consistently.
+

 	* flow.c (flow_loop_tree_node_add): Use better algorithm by passing
